title: Load in issues
body: I am getting some serious load in problems, i tried to go into a game after having a rather long client load, and when i went to get into the game, it didn't load up at all. After closing my league client and attempting to re-open it, it crashed again. Again i rebooted my client and I managed to get into the load screen and then told me it couldn't connect, so i closed it and decided to reboot my computer to see if that worked, by then the game had finished. I was wondering what on earth could be causing this?
